# BADownloadDomainAllowList

**Property List Key**

The permitted list of domains the extension can use when scheduling the initial set of asset downloads.

## Discussion

This key is required to use Background Assets.

## Initial download restrictions

- **BADownloadAllowance**: The combined, maximum size of the initial, non-essential asset download files.
- **BAEssentialDownloadAllowance**: The combined, maximum size of the essential asset download files.
